Blog.post: omg.... nearly a year....me and andrew are like soo getting married:P:P nah not really i know he hates that idea! a lot has happened over a year....i know ive grown as a person, ive seen relationships grow and fall apart...theres still so much to see in the world and i dont wanna miss a thing!! the exams are nearly over...just one to go...legal studies... i cant do it!! im going to fail!!! ....maybe it wont be so bad...i know i havent failed most of my exams...but....this is different.... well i guess the results will tell me if im a loser or not ciao:D

i dont what they are anymore one who has been there for me for 16 years decides that 16 years is enough i dont even have a best friend anymore.....suzanne left me for beccy and wont hang around me anymore because she wont "understand" and i do...i dont know what to understand...my whole world is starting to be turned upside now and im stuck to the ceiling... i dont have anyone i can just turn around and trust they'll be there when i need to fall...to trust them they'll catch me when i do..i have friends...sure...but no...best friend... maybe thats andrew???...i know that he catches me when i fall but he isnt a best friend... ahh love, sweet love.... what do you do when what your looking for doesnt even exist????

omg i just got kissed by andrew!!! what a honey:):):) he think im an idiot now....ah well i dont care ...but he still loves me and its all good:):)actually its all great;) the english exam wasnt so bad - at least i knew what i was doing! unlike the stupid ees one...i left a whole page practically blank!! i knew i failed that one long before i started it :):):):):):D:D:D:D:D:D ....im soooo happy:):):):) love katie xxxxxxxx
dont let mhim get to you....your beautiful and you dont deserve this we love you!!!!!

I shave my legs, I sit down to pee. And I can justify any shopping spree. Don't go to a barber, but a beauty salon. I can get a massage without a hard-on. I can balance the checkbook, I can pump my own gas. Can talk to my friends, about the size of my ass. My beauty's a masterpiece, and yes, it takes long. At least I can admit, to others when I'm wrong. I don't drive in circles, at any cost. And I don't have a problem, admitting I'm lost. I never forget, an important date. You just gotta deal with it, I'm usually late. I don't watch movies, with lots of gore. Don't need instant replay, to remember the score. I won't lose my hair, I don't get jock itch. And just cause I'm assertive, Don't call me a bitch. Don't say to your friends, Oh yeah, I can get her. In your dreams, my dear, I can do better! Flowers are okay, But jewelry's best. Look at me you idiot... Not at my chest???? I don't have a problem, With Expressing my feelings. I know when you're lying, You look at the ceiling. DON'T call me a GIRL , a BABE or a CHICK . I am a WOMAN. Get it?, you DICK!?!

parentals pointing fingers teachers glaring stares words staring us in the face it’s more than we can bear describe and analyse explain and discuss must we be put through this hell? apparently it’s a must divide and subtract multiply and add why do we do this? its sending me mad! should we run or should we hide be scared of our futures or be prepared just fine? what will you choose i cant decide today maybe i will tomorrow but, im sure destiny will find a way katie;)

like i said...one down.. but i hope you guys are having such a GREAT time down town or wherever the hell you guys are...:( forgive the attitude but my stupid mother wont let me go out until the exams are over....:( no fair.... anyway i just finished watching jerry springer...what a shitty show it is!! one chick wants to dump her husband n kids for some chick she just met and have sex on the stage with her..... right-o anyway thats how bored i am...there isnt even any icecream:(:(:( later

i think brad noo's about my blogg...too bad stupid idiot! oh well...like i give a flying...um...you know... anyway i cant believe oue exams are nearly here....one more day . better study i guess later

Looking into the mirror She sees herself But knowing herself to be a stranger She turns away Her beauty is shining A beacon of perfection Why does she feel so empty? Why does she feel so alone? Why does she feel so weak? Never falling tears stain her mind She cannot allow them to mar her beauty But the sadness of her expression already does To those who know What she feels She is a creature of self-condescension Blaming herself for the troubles She visits upon herself Why does she feel so empty? Why does she feel so alone? Why does she feel so weak? She silently rages at her beauty But knows she could never give it up What else has she to live for? Silks, jewelry, cosmetics.... Her anchors Yet she detests them Though she'd never admit it Why does she feel so empty? Why does she feel so alone? Why does she feel so weak? Why won't you save her? From her empty perfection elijah:)

well it seems just because i dyed my hair...anna thought that i was boy kissing andrew.....ummm....ok.. and someone else had no idea who i was!!! lol anyway...i think charlies bigbro thing was funny today...fancy tim having to get lost;) maybe some people think he is just weird...actually he is weird...remember charlies ordeal...send him a pic of you....poor boy ahem enough of that im soo freaked about the exams!! ees is so down the drain along with art and leagal studies!!.....:(:(:(:( oh one question...is there anything wrong with just wanting to be a mum when im older...(im talking in 9 years and a solid carrer and house and car)? is there anything wrong with wanting have a good life.....? katie

flawed. Sometimes you wake and see A morning bright and clear A holiday, you think From dark past yesterday Someone else you were to be Someone else held your fear Yesterday, you needed a drink Yesterday, you weren’t so afraid All the troubles far and gone The lashes prove your ignorance He punished you for your ignorance And lack of imitation of that girl The perfect one The one you despise You see through her charm of lies They cant see as you do But he wants you like her Why cant you be loved like her?

What is the beginning? Doesn’t one beginning come from another ending…? Who can really say what it is? Who…? Tell me. I need to know. I get lost in my thought sometimes. Sometimes I cant find a way out. I get scared. What if the answer I find is the wrong one? Then what? Can I go back and change it? What if I cant? I wish I didn’t have a choice. by katie buckley
let me know u love me;)

well im sitting in the pc lab being bored as hell and not doing anything except typing and crap stuff school work - stupid ms walker said she wouldnt help me on a simple question coz the stupid little yr7ers were "IMPORTANT" well whatever im going to see if kate brouht me my maccas cookies.... lol pardon the pun;) love katie xxxxx

i hate stupid private school people ahh well....i guess thats why they won.. :( anyway it was sooo imtimidating...i dunno if i can cut it in the lawyers world.... i bet i'll be a pre-school teacher...i love kids! i cant w8 to be a mummy!!....well maybe i can but u know what i mean;) i cant believe how tired i am...i should sleep a lil more often i think... actually i tihnk i'll do that;) katie

well what a day its been! i havent een in a single arguement with anyone yet and its only 5:25!!! omg!....not that i argue with many ppl its just....er u guys get my drift. anyway i cant believe we're leaving school so soon...its freaking me out!! u know even tho we'll say we'll stay in touch....be honest with yourself....will that really happen????!!!!!!????? but one tihng i know is that i'll marry andrew and guys can come to the wedding:):):) maybe u could b a bridesmaid if u buy me a big present!!!:P:P:P lol just kidding....about the present part-im marrying andrew of course!!! anyway i promise to update this as much as possible jade!!! love katie

well todays been kinda boring but its ok... very bludgey but thats ok wit hme too - since its nealry the holidays we need to get into the habit of being big fat slobs:P:P good days i tell you:o) i wrote a poem the other day...i thinks its deep too. not one of those i-think-life-is-crap-and-ill-go-kill-myself-now sorta thing just a deep...poem. its interesting too and it took me a while to write. anyway my art assessment isnt coming along too well..im not inspired anymore by...nothing interesting ever happens anymore...WELL ILL MAKE IT HAPPEN!! LOL opps...gotta go Peace ouT

oh my sami baby...:( i your ok...fuking boys...they think we're the stupid ones of the relationships!!! well 99999999999 times out of 1000000000000 the boys are at fault... i gotta go you have my heart darling sami!!! XxXxXxX

well i didnt know i was such a bad person ......i guess i should stop being such a BITCH and get on with life.... alexia said i was just downright mean and satrical!! i didnt know that!! i thought i was a nice person!!!:(:(:(and after a few comments and others...i think i should get over myself... anyway i dont give an asolute fuck about what she says...she says too much !!! .................. anyway netball is getting waaaaaay out of hand!! its getting too violent...even for me! i think i'll start x-country instead to give my calves a good work out:):):) everything is absolutley fine wit andy now but im still down with a few things...nothing to do with andrew... well things are peachy at the moment....im getting there though and thats making me happy the answer is closer than i think...i need it!!! k a t i e
wow a year who would've thought it would last this long...?:o) lol nah i sure knew it would;o) its been so much fun fuck mother i hate her

gee i think ive changed about nearly 100% in the last....3 days?? is that even possible?? i didnt think i'd ever change...little katie be the same always..why would i change??? i think i know why... to grow up everyone has to do it at some stage..i just didnt think it would be now...im still acting all cute a nd stuff its just ive grown up in my mind. im now older, and i feel it. i feel like i could move out and be able to support myself now that i have a dream. ...............if you wanna know what my dream is its to open a bar in a small town... lame i know....but its a start and thats all i need. well i have to admit im a bit philosophical today but hey...i have to be somehow so i can get somewhere one and only ;o)

my creativeness is just getting better and better!!! horrah!! anyway im doing elijah's landscapes for his books....man i hope he likes them...i hope i dont loose my touch and it all goes..:( anyway im suprised im even on this at all...well thats it im gone later xXx

like i said...FCUK EXAMS!!! i hate them!! and i hate my biology class...its the biggest waste of time ive ever ....yeah..even andrew doesnt care..i wanna learn something while im here guys!! i feel so sorry for the teacher she has to put up with mitch b and c and them...DCIKHEADS!! why do boys act like they dont care when they fail an exam...??? im guessing its because they wanna hide they're disappointment i guess well thats all the bitching i have for today... im outies

well its the first day of winnnter and its not as cold as i expected it to be...well thats inside...outside its a totally diffent story!!! its teacher stupid day today andrew the biggest cutie ever...i love him so much...:):):) i wish we didnt have to go to school tomorrow...i dont want to find out how crap i did in the legal studies..that was so unreasonably hard...:(:( ah well look on the bright side of life i guess:) pEACe xoxoxox

hey world whats down?? cos im surely not!! *yay* im bored as anything tho...hmmm nothing to do....ummmm..............gosh this IS boring im off to bed.....actually i'll talk to elijah....he's so cool to talk to what a sick boy:P:P:P haha ok now im going to bed laters!!! katie xoxoxox

The tree that used to stand So proud and tall and strong Snapped like a twig in the corporate hands Of those public servants I loved that tree; it was sturdy, strong and reliable My first love With my initials carved on the trunk When it was young. The scars I gave are still there. Lethargically it bent its branches When pushed by the wind In the cold autumn seasons But it would never break It was so strong…so reliable... And it hurt me so bad when That metal hit the trunk And beat it like a drunken father i cried andthose memories flowed like my tears its blood my blood my heart would never be the same

whats happening people my life is awesome at the moment!! everyting seems to be on a balance and thats exactly the way i want! its great! nothing too shabby and nothing too great i love life, i love andrew, i love my B-E-A-UTIFUL friends :o) i gotta go but many of you will be seeing my happy side more often!! love katie xoxox
